abort.single_instance_allowed: Already configured. Only a single configuration possible.

user.description:
Select [go2rtc](https://github.com/AlexxIT/go2rtc) streaming server version:
1. Leave blank if you want the built-in go2rtc version (*basic users*)
2. Set `http://localhost:1984` if you install go2rtc or [Frigate 12+](https://docs.frigate.video/) add-on (*advanced users*)
3. Set custom address if you install go2rtc on another server (*hackers*)
